description: Creates an AWS Firewall Manager policy.

AccountId.markdownDescription:
An AWS account ID.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^([0-9]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Base62Id.markdownDescription:
A Base62 ID

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 22  
Pattern: ^[a-z0-9A-Z]{22}$  
Update requires: No interruption

OrganizationalUnitId.markdownDescription:
An Organizational Unit ID.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 16  
Maximum Length: 68  
Pattern: ^(ou-[0-9a-z]{4,32}-[a-z0-9]{8,32})$  
Update requires: No interruption

ACCOUNT.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

ORGUNIT.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

IEMap.markdownDescription:
An FMS includeMap or excludeMap.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([^\s]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^([^\s]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: No interruption

Required: No

Allowed Values: DISTRIBUTED | CENTRALIZED  
Update requires: No interruption

Egress.description: Whether the entry is an egress entry.
Egress.markdownDescription:
Whether the entry is an egress entry.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Code.markdownDescription:
Code.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
Type.

---

Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: No interruption

Update requires: No interruption

Protocol.markdownDescription:
Protocol.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String

Update requires: No interruption

RuleAction.markdownDescription:

---

Required: Yes
